metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5381 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in program/include/rcmail.php in Roundcube Webmail 1.1.x before 1.1.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the _mbox parameter to the default URI.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5381` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-core - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-mysql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-plugins - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1').
